provide_code:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FB_PT1Filter
VAR_INPUT
	rInput: REAL:= 0.0; 								//输入数据
	rK: REAL:= 1.0; 									//增益

END_VAR
VAR_OUTPUT
	rOutput: REAL:= 0.0;  								//输出数据
END_VAR
